title: Japan: a century of imperialism

description: Episode number 1 of Series "Japan: imperial power to industrial giant". Using documentary footage, this film traces the rise and fall of Japanese imperialism between the years 1850-1945. It gives insights into Japan's internal political struggles, its militaristic philosophy, and the role of the United States in providing Japan with the tools of war.
